get.summary: Finds vulnerabilities by component version and origin

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to retrieve

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of records from the beginning of the results to skip

parameters.name: componentId
parameters.description: ID of the component to get vulnerabilities for

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: ID of the version to get vulnerabilities for

parameters.name: originId
parameters.description: ID of the origin to limit retrieved vulnerabilities to

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search term(s) to filter results by

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to retrieve

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of records from the beginning of the results to skip

parameters.name: componentId
parameters.description: ID of the component to get vulnerabilities for

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: ID of the version to get vulnerabilities for

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search term(s) to filter results by

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to retrieve

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of records from the beginning of the results to skip

parameters.name: componentId
parameters.description: ID of the component to get vulnerabilities for

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search term(s) to filter results by

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Combination of : versionName, nickname, releaseComments, releasedOn

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Combination of : userName, email, firstName, lastName

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Combination of : reportFormat, fileName, fileSize, createdAt, createdBy

infoUrl.description: The URL the extension hosts a representation of its general information at

counts.description: The risk at multiple severity levels

description.description: Summary of what the project represents in terms of functionality and use

name.description: The general identifier of the project

projectLevelAdjustments.description: Whether BOM level adjustments are applied at the project level (to all releases)

versionRequest.description: Specification of the initial version to create with the project

accessComplexity.description: How difficult it is to exploit the vulnerabilty

accessVector.description: How the vulnerability may be exploited

authentication.description: How many times authentication is required from the attacker to exploit the vulnerability

availabilityImpact.description: Impact on the availability of the system if the vulnerability is exploited

baseScore.description: Score summarizing the overall risk presented by the vulnerability

confidentialityImpact.description: Impact on the confidentiality of data on the system if the vulnerability is exploited

cweId.description: ID of the Common Weaknesses and Exposures (CWE) category the vulnerability belongs to

description.description: Short summary of the vulnerability's properties

exploitabilitySubscore.description: Sub-score detailing the risk presented by current exploit techniques or exploit availability

impactSubscore.description: Sub-score detailing the data exposure that occurs if the vulnerability is successfully exploited

integrityImpact.description: Impact on the integrity of data on the system if the vulnerability is exploited

severity.description: The general level of risk severity presented by the vulnerability

source.description: The vulnerability database/reporting authority this vulnerability originates from

vulnerabilityPublishedDate.description: The date the vulnerability was created/published

vulnerabilityUpdatedDate.description: The date of the last modification to the vulnerability information

VulnerabilityView.description: Representation of a potential software security issue

createdAt.description: The date/time the code location was created

mappedProjectVersion.description: URL specifying the version linked to the code location

type.description: Location classification relating to where the source comes from

updatedAt.description: The date/time the code location was last updated

url.description: URL describing the location of the source

active.description: Whether the user group is active and usable within the system

createdFrom.description: The system that provided the group

externalName.description: Name used to identify the group within another system

name.description: The identifying label of the user group

commitCount12Month.description: The number of commits in a 12 month period

contributorCount12Month.description: The number of contributors in a 12 month period

lastCommitDate.description: The last time a commit was made to the project

trending.description: The overall characteristics of development activity

description.description: A user-consumable summary of what the option represents

name.description: A machine-consumable identifier identifying the option despite any changes in title/description

optionType.description: The type of option being presented

options.description: The set of possible options a user may choose from for the setting

required.description: true if the option must be set when saving modification, false otherwise

singleValue.description: True if the user must provide or select only a single value from all possible choices, false if multiple values may be selected

title.description: A user-consumable label distinguishing the option among all options presented

value.description: The current value(s) selected for the option

description.description: Summary of what the project represents in terms of functionality and use

name.description: The general identifier of the project

projectLevelAdjustments.description: Whether BOM level adjustments are applied at the project level (to all releases)

component.description: URL to the full representation of the component

componentName.description: Label summarizing the identity of the component found

originId.description: ID indicating where the component came from

version.description: URL to the full representation of the version

versionName.description: Label specifying the specific version of the component found

count.description: The level of risk within the severity threshold

countType.description: The level of severity being quantified

license.description: Licensing information specific to the origin

source.description: The data source the origin is stored in

versionName.description: Label for the version the origin is associated with

source.description: Read-Only; No matter the value it will always default to 'CUSTOM'

active.description: The active status of the user.

email.description: The email of the user. Can't be modified for an external users from Hub

firstName.description: The first name of the user. Can't be modified for an external users from Hub

lastName.description: The last name of the user. Can't be modified for an external users from Hub

registeredRedirectUris.description: The pre-defined redirect URI for this client to use during the "authorization_code" access grant. See OAuth spec, section 4.1.1

scopes.description: The scope of this client. Empty if the client isn't scoped

active.description: The active status of the user.

email.description: The email of the user. Can't be modified for an external users from Hub

externalUserName.description: The external name of the user. This will have a value if the type is EXTERNAL. Can't be modified for an external users from Hub

firstName.description: The first name of the user. Can't be modified for an external users from Hub

lastName.description: The last name of the user. Can't be modified for an external users from Hub

type.description: The type of the user. Whether INTERNAL or EXTERNAL

createdByUser.description: URL where more information on the creating user can be found

updatedByUser.description: URL where more information on the last user to update the policy can be found

remediationTypes.description: defaults to empty if not present

license.description: Reference to the full representation of the license

licenseDisplay.description: Label distinguishing the license from other licenses

licenseType.description: How this license is related to other licenses within a given context

licenses.description: Additional licenses related to this license via the provided type

activityData.description: Description of development activity on the component

activityRiskProfile.description: Risk levels associated with activity aspects of the component

component.description: Reference to the representation of the component

componentName.description: Label distinguishing the component from other components

componentVersion.description: Reference to the representation of the component version

componentVersionName.description: Label distinguishing the version from other versions of the component

licenseRiskProfile.description: Risk levels associated with licensing aspects of the component

licenses.description: Any license(s) associated with the component's use in the project

operationalRiskProfile.description: Risk levels associated with operational aspects of the component

releasedOn.description: The date the component was made available for use

securityRiskProfile.description: Risk levels associated with security aspects of the component

usages.description: The usage(s) of the component within the project

versionRiskProfile.description: Risk levels associated with versioning aspects of the component

accessTokenValiditySeconds.description: The access token validity period for this client

clientId.description: The OAuth ID used by the external application to identify itself

grantTypes.description: The various authentication mechanisms the client is allowed to use with the application

refreshTokenValiditySeconds.description: The refresh token validity period for this client

registeredRedirectUris.description: The pre-defined redirect URI for this client to use during the "authorization_code" access grant. See OAuth spec, section 4.1.1

scopes.description: The scope of this client. Empty if the client isn't scoped

createdAt.description: The date/time the report was created

createdBy.description: The user that originally created this report

createdByUser.description: URL linking to more information about the user who created this report

fileName.description: The file name for the given report

fileNamePrefix.description: The file name prefix for the given report

fileSize.description: The file size for the given report

finishedAt.description: The date/time the report was finished

locale.description: The locale used in generating the report's contents

reportFormat.description: The file format for the given report

updatedAt.description: The date/time the report was last updated

distribution.description: The distribution channel of the release

nickname.description: An alternative commonly used name or alias for the release

phase.description: The phase in the development life-cycle of the release

releaseComments.description: Pertinent comments or notes associated with the release

releasedOn.description: The logical date the Release became available for usage

versionName.description: The general identifier of the release version

authenticated.description: Whether the extension is currently successfully authenticated or not

description.description: Short summary of the extension describing its functionality

infoUrl.description: URL provided by an extension which specifies the extension's properties
